text: Jesus ga helekai gi ana dama agoago, “Be koai e hagalongo adu gi goodou, ia ne hagalongo mai gi di Au. Be koai hagalee hagalongo adu gi goodou, ia digi hagalongo mai gi di Au. Be koai hagalee hagalongo mai gi di Au, ia digi hagalongo gi Tangada dela ne hagau mai Au.”10.16 Matthew 10.40; Mark 9.37; Luke 9.48; John 13.20
